name: Tap On the Edge
description:
On the Edge is best arcade running game. Run on the edges of infinite zigzag path. But How far you can you run? On the Edge is challenging your reflexes to react quickly to run on this endless, infinite zigzag edges of wall.On the Edge is very addictive infinite running game. You should be careful for the wall edges and not to fall.

Game Features:
- Character Selection
- Awesome backgound Music
- On screen tap control

How to Play:
Just tap on screen to change the direction of the character. Show your reflexes to stay as long as possible to stay on the zigzag path.
